title: Palm Of My Hands
lyrics:
I’ve got the world in the palm of my hands
All I know
I’ve got no master plan
But I know
I've got the world in the palm of my hands
The more I know
The less I understand
But I know
I’ve got the world in the palm of my hands
I've got the world in the palm of my hands
I've got the world in the palm of my hands
